description: Borrowed from French statuesque, equivalent to statue +â€Ž -esque.

adjectives.description: statuesque (comparative more statuesque, superlative most statuesque)

entries.meaning: Resembling or characteristic of a statue. [from 18th c.]
(of a woman) Elegantly tall, graceful, and attractive. [from 19th c.]
examples: Christy Turlington is a statuesque supermodel famous for her fashion ads.
